page.title: 16 Transport
page.content: In 1965 the railway through{Longhope} was closed and since then the only {public transport}has been a bus service to{Gloucester,Ross and {Hereford}along the{A40}and a service to{Gloucester,Cinderford and Monmouth} along the{A4136}.The{bus service}is not very frequent and most people rely on their own cars for shopping trips and daily journeys to work. The lack of shops in the village mean that trips to{Ross}or{Gloucester}are quite frequent. Most people we interviewed preferred{Gloucester}but this was not surprising as it had the most frequent {bus service}.The main roads carry lorry traffic and tourists bound for{ {Wales}and we have noticed people use the village road as a short cut between the two main roads. {
